overview: Here it is folks, Don Cherry 12, and Blue and I think this one is the best. This year I'm going to answer some of the mail I get from you the fans. Of course we have the best hits, saves, goals, and more from last year's regular season and playoffs. As a special bonus, we'll take a look back at some of my old Grapevine shows. Hey, my hockey tapes are the best tapes in the world, over 2,000,000 hockey fans can't be wrong.
tagline: Highlights from the 1999-2000 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry 12
